name: Healthyfied Almond Vanilla Protein Shake
description: Indulge in a refreshing and nutritious Healthyfied Almond Vanilla Protein Shake, perfectly catering to your high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar dietary preferences. This delectable blend, featured among our Healthy Recipes, is the ultimate choice for those seeking a healthful twist without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Measure and prepare all ingredients: 140 grams of unsweetened almond milk, 10 ounces of water, 1 teaspoon of monk fruit, and 2 scoops (approximately 50g) of Classic Plus Vanilla Protein.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add almond milk, water, monk fruit, and vanilla protein into a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high for about 1 minute or until the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the protein shake into a glass and enjoy immediately for the best taste and consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
